Text:
Ripper Street is a BBC mini-series set in Whitechapel in London's East End in 1889, six months after the 
infamous Jack the Ripper murders. The series stars Matthew Macfadyen (The Pillars of the 
Earth,Criminal Justice), Jerome Flynn (Game of Thrones) and Adam Rothenberg. 

The first episode will be broadcast on 30 December 2012 as part of BBC One's Christmas 2012 package, 
and will also form part of BBC Americaâ€™s Dramaville starting on 19 January 2013.There will be 8 
episodes

Cast

Matthew Macfadyen - Detective Inspector Edmund Reid
Jerome Flynn - Detective Sergeant Bennet Drake
Adam Rothenberg - Captain Homer Jackson
MyAnna Buring - Long Susan
Charlene McKenna - Rose Erskine
Clive Russell - Chief inspector Fred Abeline
Amanda Hale - Emily Reid
Jonathan Barnwell - Police Constable Dick Hobbs
David Wilmot - Sergeant Donald Artherton
David Dawson - Fred Best
